00_rooms.name: Sacred room
descriptions: Not very big room with a stone altar of sorts and a carped near the wall.
Looks like a ritual room. Over the stone altar hangs a wierd piece of jewelery. You can't quite figure out what could it be and for what porpouse.

00_rooms.name: Deset well
descriptions: What a sight... Just and old plain well made of stone bricks, a stone in the sand. In the distance you can see a large "triangle".

00_rooms.name: View on the piramid
descriptions: Before your ery eyes you see impressive piramid made ages or centuries ago by unknown hands. You can feel the mistery in the air.
Monumental building made eons ago. You wonder, who could build such thing? You still wonder...
